function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure of stay-at-home orders to effectively curb community transmission of COVID-19 due to permeability and abuse","Impact":"Increased spread of SARS-CoV-2 and higher risk of overwhelming public health system","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of stay-at-home orders, public education on responsible behavior, and penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring movement and compliance","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Emergence of new strains of SARS-CoV-2, such as Omicron, posing new challenges and being more infectious","Impact":"Increased difficulty in controlling the spread of the virus and potential decrease in effectiveness of existing measures","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, research and development of targeted treatments, enhanced monitoring and border control","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing for strain identification, vaccine development technology","People":"Global population, public health organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, scientific research institutions"}]}
